void.string: insert into fnbl_client_mapping (principal, sync_source, guid, luid, last_anchor) values(?, ?, ?, ?,?)
update fnbl_client_mapping set luid=?, last_anchor=? where principal=? and sync_source=? and guid=?
select luid,guid,last_anchor from fnbl_client_mapping where principal=? and sync_source=? order by guid
delete from fnbl_client_mapping where principal=? and sync_source=? and luid=?
